Parameter.name: database.jdbc.driver
Parameter.description: canonical name of JDBC driver class

Parameter.name: database.jdbc.url
Parameter.description: full JDBC connection URL, including username and password

Parameter.name: shibboleth.discofeed.url
Parameter.description: absolute URL to /Shibboleth.sso/DiscoFeed, either localhost or using SSL

Parameter.name: shibboleth.login.url
Parameter.description: URL to /Shibboleth.sso/Login, preferably absolute and using SSL

Parameter.name: shibboleth.default.target
Parameter.description: default URL to visit after login if none given; empty to return an error message in that case

Parameter.name: discovery.web.root
Parameter.description: root URL of servlet, usually absolute but without scheme component

Parameter.name: discovery.friendly.idps
Parameter.description: number of IdPs to show in the 'friendly' discovery

Parameter.name: discovery.friendly.others
Parameter.description: text to show on the 'other IdPs' button
